reviews.title: Shin is who you want in your corner
reviews.body: Shin is the most hands on and dedicated lawyer in the area (IMO). He takes the time to really understand your situation completely and thoroughly reviews all facts. He is the one you want in your corner when you're up against the justice system in any scenario.

reviews.title: Illinois Traffic Ticket
reviews.body: Shin Cho was very helpful with a traffic ticket issue in Illinois. I was very pleased at the results and will definitely use him again.

reviews.title: Missouri Charge reduced
reviews.body: I had a great experience with using The Law Office Of Shin Cho , Very professional , communicative and persistent. I was very satisfied in the results of my case.I will hire him in the future if I ever need a lawyer again !  I have and will continue to refer Shin Co in the future  to friends and family.

reviews.title: It's the little things
reviews.body: I hired Shin before he was out on his own and over a year later when it was realized that the court system had screwed up some of my paperwork, it was Shin that I called to help me sort it out. Not being with the firm anymore, he could have easily just pointed me back towards his old firm to help sort it out. Instead he took it on himself, for free, and sorted it out no questions asked. I am also an extremely busy person with my career, so it is important to me to be able to communicate efficiently, and often at non-standard business hours. Shin made that easy and I didn't even have to ask. Right from the start he was accessible to me when I needed him to be and was always quick to reply by phone, email, or text. There is no doubt that Shin is a fine lawyer, but it is the little things that separate Shin and make him a cut above the rest.

reviews.title: Responsive, Compassionate and Diligent
reviews.body: I live out of state and was charged with a small possession charge in Missouri; on the way to a wedding. I found Shin on Avvo and during our first email exchange - he immediately calmed me down. He listened engagingly to my story, got all the details, asked what my ideal outcome would be and then gave me some different scenarios based on the knowledge & information he had. He executed on exactly what needed to be done and ended up getting charges dropped and never having to go to court and just having to paying a fine. Not only did Shin get what I wanted out of court - but he listened and followed through on every interaction we had and gave me peace of mind that my case was being taken care of while explaining each step. I couldn't give a higher recommendation and he is your guy if you are in the "my life is over" thinking I was in when searching for a lawyer.

reviews.title: Results!
reviews.body: Shin was excellent! He worked with me to get the results that I wanted. He didn't beat around the bush and was up front with me about the entire process. He got my DWI case straightened out and I was more than pleased with the results. He is a lawyer who cares and will do everything he can to help you. I don't ever plan on needing his services again but I will definitely recommend him to anyone I know and care about that finds themselves in a similar situation.

reviews.title: Excellent Lawyer
reviews.body: I highly recommend Shin as a lawyer.  He helped us when our son had a DWI.  He was patient with us.  He was very thorough and reviewed the case completely.  Because of his understanding of law and his hard work, we were able to get positive results.

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.body: Stayed with me through the entire process. His guidance was invaluable. All throughout the appeals process his perseverance helped bring a favorable result to my case.

reviews.title: Outstanding! Highly Recommend
reviews.body: I would definitely recommend calling Mr. Cho if you are in need of legal services. Mr. Cho really takes the time to go over everything with you in detail, also VERY professional. I had my fair shares of lawyers in the past and its comforting that I have one Lawyer that I trust to handle everything the right way!

reviews.title: Great experience!
reviews.body: Shin Cho was super helpful in fixing my ticket to turn it into a non-moving violation and make sure there are no points on my license. The process was super quick and efficient! Thank you so much for your help!
